name: Aldo's Fancy
method: Mix Cognac and Marsala. Add Maraschino and bitters. Mix, stronger

variations.name: Blue Alexander
variations.variant: Blue Curaçao instead of Creme de Cacao

ingredients.ingredientName: Apple Juice or Apple Cider or Apple Liqueur

name: Apricot-Mango Martini
method: Muddle the Mango pieces in shaker. Shake and fine strain

variations.name: Moonlight
variations.variant: Lime Juice instead of Lemon and Cointreau instead of Maraschino

name: Bacardi Fizz
method: Shake first all ingredients with half the rum. Then add the rest of the rum and shake again. Strain and top

name: Batida
method: Mix in a glass full of ice

name: Bay Breeze
method: Build in glass. Float the Pineapple Juice

name: Bee's Kiss
description: From the Ritz Bar in Paris (1936)

name: Between The Sheets
description: Created in 1930s by Harry MacElhone, Harry's New York Bar, Paris

variations.name: Variation  n°1
variations.variant: 4 parts Vodka, 2 Strawberry Liqueur and 1 Blue Curaçao

variations.name: Black Magic
variations.variant: add a dash of Lemon Juice and garnish with a Lemon Twist

name: Black Velvet
variations: Poor Man's Black Velvet (replace Guinness with Cider)

ingredients.ingredientName: Myer's Rum or other Dark Rum

name: Bloody Mary

variations.name: Bull Shot
variations.variant: Beef Bouillon or Beef Consomme instead of Tomato Juice

garnish: Salt or Pepper Rim and Celery Stick

name: Blue Hawaii
garnish: Pineapple or Orange Slice and Maraschino Cherry on a toothpick

name: Blue Lagoon
method: Shake only Vodka first. Then add Curaçao and shake again. Strain

name: Blue Monday
description: From Harry Craddock's Savoy Cocktail Book

name: Brain Haemorrhage
method: Layer in order. Sink the Grenadine

name: Bramble
method: Build in glass over crushed ice

name: Brandy Cocktail
description: From Jerry Thomas' The Bon-Vivant's Companion Or How To Mix Drinks (1862)

name: Brandy Sour
method: Stir and strain. Top with Water And Lemon

ingredients.ingredientName: Water And Lemon (made with 1 part of Lemon Juice and 4-5 parts of Water)

name: Breakfast Martini
garnish: Orange Twist or a Slice of a Toast

name: Bronx
description: Created in 1906 by Johnny Solon, Waldorf-Astoria, NY

name: Brown Derby
description: From the Vendome Club in Hollywood, 1930

name: Buck's Fizz
method: Pour the Juice then the Champagne. Mix gently

name: Bush Fire
method: Build in glass. Sink the Tabasco

name: Caipirinha
method: Muddle in glass. Pour Cachaça. Fill with crushed ice

ingredients.ingredientName: Sugar cube soaked with Angostura bitters

name: Chocolate Punch
description: From 'The Flowing Bowl' by William Schmidt, 1891

name: Claremont
method: Muddle fruits, bitters and Curaçao. Build Soda and Bourbon in glass

name: Clover Club
method: Dry shake, wet shake, fine strain

name: Cobbler
method: Shake hard and strain over crushed ice

variations.name: Blue Cosmopolitan
variations.variant: white Cranberry Juice instead of red and Blue Curaçao instead of Triple Sec

variations.name: Peach Cosmopolitan
variations.variant: Peach Schnapps instead of Triple Sec and Peach Juice instead of Cranberry

name: Culto A La Vida
method: Blend Sugar and Lime Juice. Then add ice, blend again.  Finally add the Raspberry Juice and the Rum. Blend

name: Daiquiri Floridita
method: Shake with crushed ice and strain

variations.name: Partly Cloudy
variations.variant: Vodka instead of Rum and Gatorade instead of Beer

name: Douglas Fairbanks
method: Shake very hard and fine strain

name: Fish House Punch
description: There's a little place just out of town; Where, if you go to lunch, They'll make you forget your mother-in-law; With a drink called Fish-House Punch.

name: Flirtini
method: Muddle strawberries in the flute. Stir and fine strain the rest

name: French 75
method: Shake hard, fine strain, top and stir gently

name: French Martini
method: Stir in mixing glass and strain

variations.name: Sloe Gin Fizz
variations.variant: Sloe Gin, simple Sugar and 1 Egg White instead of normal Gin and the Syrup

variations.name: Golden Fizz
variations.variant: add 1 Egg Yolk and make it 4.5 parts of Sugar Syrup

variations.name: Royal Fizz
variations.variant: add 1 whole Egg and make it 4.5 parts of Sugar Syrup

variations.name: Coffee Grasshopper
variations.variant: Coffee liqueur instead of Creme de Cacao

variations.name: Banshee
variations.variant: Creme de Banane instead of Creme de Menthe and 2 parts of Cream

name: Hanky-Panky Martini
description: Created by Ada Coleman, first Bar Manager of American Bar, Savoy Hotel

name: Horse's Neck
garnish: Lemon Peel Spiral (put in glass before everything else, ice included)

ingredients.ingredientName: Roses Lime Cordial or Sugar Syrup

name: Irish Coffee
method: Heat Coffee, Whiskey and Sugar. Do not boil. Build in glass and top with Cream

variations.name: Café Amore
variations.variant: 2cl Brandy and 2cl Amaretto liqueur instead of Whiskey

variations.name: Calypso Coffee
variations.variant: Rum and Kahlua, 2cl/2cl, instead of Whiskey

variations.name: Mexican Coffee
variations.variant: 2cl Tequila and 2cl Kahlua instead of Whiskey

variations.name: Kioke Coffee
variations.variant: 2cl Brandy and 2cl Kahlua instead of Whiskey

name: Kir
method: Build and stir gently in glass

variations.name: Cidre Royal
variations.variant: Cider and Calvados instead of Wine

variations.name: Peche
variations.variant: Peach liqueur instead of Creme de Cassis

name: Lemon Drop
method: Drop the sugar cube in glass. Shake hard and fine strain. Pour over sugar

name: Long Island Iced Tea
method: Build in glass, or shake and strain

name: Mai-tai
method: Shake hard and strain over crushed ice. Float the Dark rum on top

name: Manhattan
method: Stir in mixing glass and strain

variations.name: Fourth Regiment
variations.variant: 1:1 ratio of Whiskey and Vermouth and 3 dashes, 1 each, of Orange, Celery and Peychaud's Bitters

ingredients.ingredientName: Sweet Vermouth (Sweet Manhattan)/Dry Vermouth (Dry Manhattan)/1 part each (Perfect Manhattan)

garnish: Maraschino Cherry (Sweet Manhattan)/Lemon Twist (Dry Manhattan)/Orange Twist and Lemon Twist and Maraschino Cherry (Perfect Manhattan)

name: Martinez
method: Stir in mixing glass and strain

name: Martini
method: Stir in mixing glass and strain

variations.name: Dirty Martini
variations.variant: Vodka instead of Gin and 2 parts of Olive Juice

garnish: Lemon Twist or Olive(s) on a stick

variations.name: Grand Mimosa
variations.variant: add 2 parts of Grand Marnier and make 50/50 of Champagne and Orange Juice

name: Mint Julep
method: Muddle ingredients except Bourbon in glass. Add crushed ice and Bourbon. Churn

name: Mojito
description: Many bars use 2 bar spoons of white or brown sugar rather than sugar syrup
method: Slap mint, add other ingredients, churn with crushed ice

variations.name: Cardinaloski
variations.variant: Vodka instead of Gin and a few Angostura bitters drops

name: Old Fashioned
method: Muddle the Angostura soaked sugar cube with Soda Water. Gradually add ice and Whisky while gently stirring

variations.name: Variation n°1
variations.variant: for a quicker preparation, it's possible to use Sugar Syrup instead of the sugar cube

name: Piña Colada
method: Shake with crushed ice and strain

name: Pisco Sour
method: Dry shake, wet shake and strain. No ice

name: Planter's Punch
method: Shake and strain. Add Bitters at the end

name: Ramos Fizz
method: Dry shake, shake hard and strain in a Collins glass without ice

variations.name: Silver Fizz
variations.variant: remove the Lime, the Milk, the Vanilla extract and the Orange Flower water

name: Rob Roy
method: Shake and fine strain. No ice

variations.name: Smoky Nail
variations.variant: Islay Whisky instead of Blended Scotch

variations.name: Donald Sutherland
variations.variant: Canadian Whiskey instead of Blended Scotch

name: Sangria
method: Stir fruits with the wine. Add sugar and cinnamon. Let rest for 4-6 hours. Serve over plenty of ice

name: Sazerac
method: Stir in mixing glass, strain into Absinthe rinsed glass (no ice)

variations.name: Shore Breeze
variations.variant: Rum instead of Vodka and Pineapple Juice instead of Grapefruit

variations.name: Sex On The Beach - US version
variations.variant: 1 part each for Midori and Chambord instead of Peach liqueur and Pineapple Juice instead of Orange Juice

name: Sex With An Alligator
method: Shake Midori and Sweet and Sour Mix. Strain in glass. Layer then the Raspberry Liqueur and Jaegermeister, in this order

name: Sidecar
garnish: Half Sugar rim on glass (your choice)

name: Stinger
method: Stir in a mixing glass and fine strain

variations.name: White Spider
variations.variant: Vodka instead of Cognac and equal parts with Creme de Menthe

name: Tequila Sunrise
method: Build in glass. Sink the Grenadine

variations.name: Florida Sunrise
variations.variant: half Pineapple and half Orange Juice

name: Vampiro
garnish: Lime Wedge and Chili (Green or Red)

name: Whisky Sour
description: Can dry shake if using egg white for better texture/foam

name: White Martini
description: Recipe per Phil Wood of Roxy Bar and Screen, London
